Are you or a friend planning to vote in person, by mail, or by dropbox? Still unsure about how to vote on state and local ballot measures?

Join the ACLU SoCal, this Saturday, for our "Bring Your Own Ballot" Party & Information Session at 11 a.m. PT. Please note: This link will take you to a third-party website, zoom.us.

ACLU SoCal "Bring Your Own Ballot" Party & Information Session

Saturday, October 17, 11 a.m. – 12 p.m.
Zoom

RSVP Today

Please note: This link will take you to a third-party website, zoom.us.

We'll go through our 2020 Ballot Guide and finalize your voting plan. Please bring:

✔. 2020 Official Ballot or Sample Ballot.

✔. Voter Plan Checklist.

✔. Questions regarding California ballot measures.

California voters will decide on critical propositions and local measures that will impact our communities directly. Remember, if you haven't registered to vote in California, you can still do so online or by mail by October 19, and in-person through Election Day. Register now. Please note: This link will take you to a third-party website, registertovote.ca.gov.

Be an ACLU voter and vote for our future.
